message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start
Your split was a kind offer Alice, but I need a bit more to make it worthwhile for me.  How about we try a 55/45 split?
I see you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I'll meet you halfway between my first offer and your counteroffer.
I appreciate you meeting me closer to the middle, Alice.  How about this: if you give me a bit more, we can seal the deal right now and stop losing money to inflation.  52/48 sound fair?
